comments.author: smiley.1438
comments.body: I think it was mentioned before to expose the account’s/character’s age via the API. When in doubt, just open a pull request over here: https://github.com/arenanet/api-cdi/pulls

comments.author: Tobley.6138
comments.body: I could be mistaken, but you can already check this with the /age command in-game

comments.author: itomaldonado.9138
comments.body:
Would it make sense to have an endpoint for getting the age/played time of the account?

Maybe the /account endpoint can display the total age while the /characters endpoint can display individual character’s age.
